no-conflict-scenario.description: Work order scheduled with no conflicts with maintenance windows
expectedExplanation: Work order scheduled successfully with no conflicts

shift-conflict-scenario.description: Work center has no shift for initial date, work order gets rescheduled

reason: No shift available on initial date

expectedExplanation: Work order rescheduled to next available shift

maintenance-conflict-scenario.description: Work order conflicts with maintenance window and gets rescheduled
expectedExplanation: Work order rescheduled after maintenance window

partial-fit-scenario.description: Work order partially fits in remaining shift after maintenance

reason: Spills over to next available time

expectedExplanation: Work order scheduled in remaining shift time after maintenance

full-shift-blocked-scenario.description: Full shift blocked by maintenance, work order moves to next shift
expectedExplanation: Work order rescheduled to next available shift due to full day maintenance
